attributes.additional_details: Please please support this case and help this Veteran through a tough time. Get this judge to reverse her ruling and prevent this veteran from going to prison. Helen has been threatened with 1 month prison away from her family if she does not pay 4000€ by October 2015 when no criminal offence has been committed. EU, UK and French laws were ignored. Evidence was not taken into account and Human rights were totally ignored! As a Veteran of 10 years, Helen deserves better!
attributes.background: 3rd of September a Judge in Limoges, France took away part of a UK War pension to give to her ex partner, because that partner does not work! The judge commented "I don't care about laws protecting war pensioners" I think they are nonsense and I don't care what injuries you sustained whilst serving.

rejection.details: We can only accept petitions about matters that are the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament. This looks like an issue that would need to be raised with the authorities in France.
